meanings.definition: To style or arrange (hair) in a large, rounded shape.
meanings.sent1: She poufed her hair for the party.
meanings.sent2: Every morning, she poufed her hair before going to work.
meanings.sent3: The cat poufed its fur to look bigger when scared.
meanings.sent4: The clouds poufed up in the sky, resembling cotton candy.
meanings.sent5: The chef poufed the whipped cream on top of the dessert.

meanings.definition: A hairstyle or hairdo characterized by a large, rounded shape.
meanings.sent1: Her poufed hairstyle was the talk of the town.
meanings.sent2: The actress sported a glamorous poufed hairdo at the event.
meanings.sent3: The clown's poufed wig made everyone laugh at the circus.
meanings.sent4: The poufed hair of the doll made it look like a princess.
meanings.sent5: The bride's poufed updo was elegant and stunning.
